entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
